archimate:AccessRelationship.name: 6 - Telemetry Alarm Raised?
archimate:AccessRelationship.documentation: Observed or forecast data may trigger the telemetry system to generate an alarm if a threshold has been exceeded. The telemetry alarm data will change the behaviour of the telemetry device (e.g. poll at a higher frequency) and a notification will be sent to a pre-configured duty officer.
